dublinCore.dc:title: 113 HR 3866 IH: To prohibit an increase in the number of flag and general officers.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Grayson introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Armed Services

form.official-title: To prohibit an increase in the number of flag and general officers.

section.header: No increase in flag or general officers
section.text: No funds appropriated for fiscal year 2014 may be used for flag or general officers for each military department that are in excess to the number of such officers serving in such military department as of the date of enactment of this Act.
